page.title: 15Interview - Reen Manor Farm
page.content: The old farm at Reen is one of tho oldest settlements in the Perranporth area.The present day owner is Mr. Opie.The children of our class went to interview him.They asked him many questions.It appears that the farm has gone through great changes recently. Last year the European Parliament announced measures to cut back in the over production of milk and dairy products within the community.Our government gave dairy farmers quotas so that surplus milk would not have to be subsidised.Farmers had no option but to reduce their herds and a lot have had to go out of business.Mr. Opie sold off his herd and converted his farm into holiday chalets.He does,however,keep some horses and a few hens.He also sells hay.He is philosophical and says he still has the "Stone and the land!"
